name: pnp-list-formatting-current-year-rowclass
title: Current Year Row Class
shortDescription: Demonstrates applying a class to rows where a value equals the current year. Can easily be updated to compare other portions of the date such as the month, hour, minute etc. by using the other date-part operators.
longDescription: Demonstrates applying a class to rows where a value equals the current year. Can easily be updated to compare other portions of the date such as the month, hour, minute etc. by using the other date-part operators.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
